recent_news: ecoinvent released v3.12 in November 2025 — the world's leading LCA (Life Cycle Assessment) database with 26,000+ peer-reviewed datasets
ecoinvent data is a core input for ESG and environmental reporting — mandatory for credible ESG compliance
ecoinvent is a Zürich-based non-profit with global reach — used by regulators, consultants, and sustainability teams worldwide
The v3.12 update expands sectors including batteries, textiles, and agriculture — relevant for Swiss SME reporting
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Armin is the outbound sales lead at ecoinvent — the world's leading LCA database. Bramha ESG's AI-native compliance platform needs to integrate ecoinvent's LCI database for credible scope 3 emissions reporting. Two angles: (1) a data licensing partnership where Bramha ESG uses ecoinvent data as a premium add-on; (2) ecoinvent as a distribution partner — they sell to ESG teams who need compliance tools. Reach out: 'Armin — I am building Bramha ESG, an AI-native ESG compliance platform for Swiss SMEs. We are exploring integrating ecoinvent's LCI data as the emissions factor backbone. I would love 20 minutes to discuss a data partnership. Are you open to a call?' Timeline: this month.
